original_title: 隠された爪跡　関東大震災朝鮮人虐殺記録映画
overview: In the wake of the Great Kanto Earthquake (1923), which killed nearly 100,000 people, more than 6,500 Koreans were murdered by the military, the police and civilians. This film uses evidence and testimony to examine the history behind this massacre.
title: Hidden Scars: The Great Kanto Earthquake Korean Massacre, A Documentary
